description: This table extracts the related multiple-response Intestine Status Reasons History (I HSB 30523) item.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: IN_STATUS_REASONS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reasons the transplant patient was given the corresponding intestine status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Temporarily unsuitable for transplant


Liver function test abnormalities


No longer has vascular access
